welcome_message_body: Welcome to Kundli, India! Known for its vibrant culture, delicious cuisine, and stunning historical sites, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the charm of our beautiful city. Enjoy your stay!

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal mainly serves domestic flights and low-cost carriers.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: This terminal serves as the main international terminal and is one of the largest terminals in India.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
